full_summary:
**Heavy Vehicles Inspection and Repair Services Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**
================================================

### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3559054179-Doc3559054246
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3559054179
* **Bid Closing Date:** December 21, 2022, at 14:00 EST

### Call Type and Selection Criteria

* **Call Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
* **Evaluation Method:** Lowest Price

### Scope of Work

 PWGSC, on behalf of Department of National Defence, is issuing this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Heavy Vehicles Inspection and Repair Services located in  Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Québec, Canada. The services include maintenance and repairs for heavy vehicles, as detailed in Annex A.

### Requirements

* All supporting documentation and bids must be submitted prior to the bid closing date.
* Bids submitted after the bid closing date will not be considered responsive.

### Trade Agreements and Regions

This RFSO is open to bidders who are eligible to participate under Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

Only interested bidders must register through the BC Bid Doc template accessible through the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13423689?extsite=MTM0MjM2ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13423689?extsite=MTM0MjM2ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

The contact person for this RFSO is Julie Carbonneau (Julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

Note: All informations required to submit a bid will be considered through the website mentioned above.
